appinfo.about:
Wnmp 2.0.3 ********** - Wnmp Control Panel 2.0.8
* Faster control panel startup(0.15348 vs. 0.183). * Windows XP/2003 support dropped. * Added Windows version definitions for Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2. * Added control panel updater and changelog viewer and fixed some minor bugs. * Removed the border around the icon. * Various fixes and improvments.
- PHP
* Updated to 5.5.6
- phpMyAdmin
* Updated to 4.0.9
